title: SET_TRAIN_DOOR_OPEN_RATIO
content:
0x2468DBE8// SetTrainDoorOpenRatio
void SET_TRAIN_DOOR_OPEN_RATIO(Vehicle train, int doorIndex, float ratio);Parameters:train: The train to set the door ratio for.doorIndex: Zero-based door index.ratio: A value between 0.0 (fully closed) and 1.0 (fully open).Sets the ratio that a door is open for on a train.Examples:LuaC#-- open all doors on a train
local doorCount = GetTrainDoorCount(train)
for doorIndex = 0, doorCount - 1 do
    SetTrainDoorOpenRatio(train, doorIndex, 1.0)
end
codeBlocks:
// SetTrainDoorOpenRatio
void SET_TRAIN_DOOR_OPEN_RATIO(Vehicle train, int doorIndex, float ratio);

-- open all doors on a train
local doorCount = GetTrainDoorCount(train)
for doorIndex = 0, doorCount - 1 do
    SetTrainDoorOpenRatio(train, doorIndex, 1.0)
end
